io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.server

Interface AsyncHalResponseRenderer


  • @ProviderType
public interface AsyncHalResponseRenderer
    Asynchronously creates a HalResponse from a server-side HalApiInterface implementation instance, using AsyncHalResourceRenderer to render a HalResource, and VndErrorResponseRenderer to handle any errors that might happen during resource rendering.

    This renderer is used internally to implement Rhyme.renderResponse(LinkableResource), but may also be used directly in advanced testing or integration scenarios.

    See Also:
    AsyncHalResourceRenderer, VndErrorResponseRenderer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AsyncHalResponseRenderer create(RequestMetricsCollector metrics, ExceptionStatusAndLoggingStrategy exceptionStrategy)
      Deprecated. 
      Use HalResponseRendererBuilder instead

      Deprecated. 
      Use HalResponseRendererBuilder instead
      io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single<HalResponse> renderResponse(String requestUri, io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources.LinkableResource resourceImpl)
      Asynchronously render the given resource as a HalResponse instance.

    • Method Detail

      • renderResponse

        io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single<HalResponse> renderResponse(String requestUri,
                                                             io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources.LinkableResource resourceImpl)
        Asynchronously render the given resource as a HalResponse instance. If rendering is successful, that instance will have a 200 status code and a HAL+JSON media type. If any errors were thrown and handled, a vnd.error response will be rendered instead (using the status code obtained from the ExceptionStatusAndLoggingStrategy)
        Parameters:
        requestUri - the URI of the incoming request
        resourceImpl - a server-side implementation instance of an interface annotated with HalApiInterface
        Returns:
        a Single that emits a HalResponse with initialized properties

      • create

        @Deprecated
static AsyncHalResponseRenderer create(RequestMetricsCollector metrics,
                                                   ExceptionStatusAndLoggingStrategy exceptionStrategy)
        Deprecated. Use HalResponseRendererBuilder instead
        Parameters:
        metrics - an instance of RequestMetricsCollector to collect performance and caching information for the current incoming request
        exceptionStrategy - allows to control the status code and logging of exceptions being thrown during rendering
        Returns:
        a new AsyncHalResponseRenderer to use for the current incoming request

      • create

        @Deprecated
static AsyncHalResponseRenderer create(RequestMetricsCollector metrics,
                                                   ExceptionStatusAndLoggingStrategy exceptionStrategy,
                                                   HalApiAnnotationSupport annotationSupport,
                                                   HalApiReturnTypeSupport returnTypeSupport)
        Deprecated. Use HalResponseRendererBuilder instead
        Alternative factory method that allows to support different HAL API annotations or method return types
        Parameters:
        metrics - an instance of RequestMetricsCollector to collect performance and caching information for the current incoming request
        exceptionStrategy - allows to control the status code and logging of exceptions being thrown during rendering
        annotationSupport - an (optional) strategy to identify HAL API interfaces and methods that use different annotations
        returnTypeSupport - an (optional) strategy to support additional return types in your HAL API interface methods
        Returns:
        a new AsyncHalResponseRenderer to use for the current incoming request
